title: ISwOLEObject.Aspect
description: Gets the viewing aspect for this OLE object.
returns: Viewing aspect as defined in the DVASPECT enumeration (see Remarks )
remarks:
The ViewingAspect argument uses the DVASPECT enumeration, which has the following values:
DVASPECT_CONTENT = 1
DVASPECT_THUMBNAIL = 2
DVASPECT_ICON = 4
DVASPECT_DOCPRINT = 8
See the MSDN documentation for additional details about the DVASPECT enumeration.
